quests.name: Testing the Power of Quests
quests.unknownHint: Check with the Quest Manager in the Test Oasis.
quests.overview:
As a flex of your amazing skills, you get the honor of executing a number of mundane tasks that the Quest Lord has dictated must be done.
Each one is a test of the system and not of your skill, so don't feel bad if you suck and fail to complete them.

objectives.description: The Quest Manager seems kinda pushy about talking to him again...

logs.inactive: The objective has yet to be discovered.
logs.active: The Quest Manager claims to have a 'choice' that you should interact with that matters apparently?.
logs.completed: To no one's surprise, the Quest Manager had nothing meaningful to say. What a waste.
logs.failed: You decided to give up on questing forever and just be a potato.
logs.missed: You opted against talking to the Quest Manager, it was too much work.

fulfillmentData: Use the unique 'choice' that shows up when talking to the Quest Manager.

objectives.description: The AI Oasis looks pretty cool, so you should go downstairs and take a peek.

logs.inactive: The objective has yet to be discovered.
logs.active: As a flex of the destination-type objectives, you just need to go to the AI Oasis downstairs .
logs.completed: You're not sure what you gained from walking over those tiles, but at least the objectives seem to progress.
logs.failed: You decided going into the AI Oasis was for noobs- fuck this whole ass quest.
logs.missed: You opted against going into the AI Oasis, and life went on.

objectives.description: The Quest Manager has requested 5x \Item[151]s- and you shall deliver (like with the debugger).

logs.inactive: The objective has yet to be discovered.
logs.active: Somehow acquire 5x \Item[151]s to complete the fetch-type objective.
logs.completed: Regardless of how you acquired the \Item[151]s, you're ready for something more exciting.
logs.failed: You said 'fuck it' to getting the Quest Manager those 5x \Item[151]s; he wept.
logs.missed: You forgot to acquire the 5x \Item[151]s, and the Quest Manager was severely disillusioned.

objectives.description: The Quest Manager has requested you slay 3x \Enemy[11]s- and who doesn't like chopping them up?

logs.inactive: The objective has yet to be discovered.
logs.active: You didn't need an objective to chop up \Enemy[11]s, but doing so will complete the objective.
logs.completed: While you slayed the requisite mount of \Enemy[11]s, no one will shame you for slaying more.
logs.failed: You said 'fuck it' to slaying those 3x \Enemy[11]s; he wept.
logs.missed: You forgot to slay 3x \Enemy[11]s, and the Quest Manager was severely disillusioned.

objectives.description: The Quest Manager has requested you complete \Quest[side-1] before continuing any further.

logs.inactive: The objective has yet to be discovered.
logs.completed: Doing a quest to complete another quest objective never felt better.
logs.failed: Quest-ception is kinda stupid, so you said 'fuck this quest'.
logs.missed: Oops, completing a quest to complete another quest was too complicated I guess?

quests.name: Slay three \Enemy[11]
quests.unknownHint: Check with the test quest giver in the Test Oasis for this short side quest.
quests.overview: This is just some random side quest that doesn't offer a lot of value, but does demonstrate what a single-objective quest looks like.

objectives.description: The Quest Manager has requested you slay 1x \Enemy[11]s- and who doesn't like chopping them up?

logs.inactive: The objective has yet to be discovered.
logs.completed: After slaying the \Enemy[11], you feel like a better servant to society.
logs.failed: You said 'fuck it' to slaying the \Enemy[11]s; he wept.
logs.missed: You forgot to slay the \Enemy[11]s, and the Quest Manager was severely disillusioned.

quests.name: Need for pudding
quests.unknownHint: Check with the test quest giver in the Test Oasis for this short side quest.
quests.overview: This is just some random side quest that doesn't offer a lot of value, but does demonstrate what a single-objective quest looks like.

objectives.description: The Quest Manager has requested 5x \Item[151]s- and you shall deliver.

logs.inactive: The objective has yet to be discovered.
logs.active: Acquire somehow 5x \Item[151]s to complete the objective.
logs.completed: After acquiring so many \Item[151]s, you feel you'll never want to see them again.
logs.failed: You said 'fuck it' to getting the Quest Manager those 5x \Item[151]s; he wept.
logs.missed: You forgot to acquire the 5x \Item[151]s, and the Quest Manager was severely disillusioned.

quests.name: Hunter: \Enemy[11] Edition
quests.overview: Aside from this quest revolving around slaughtering \Enemy[11]s, it seems to serve little purpose.

objectives.description: You feel compelled to strike out and chop up \_a lot\_ of ghosties.

logs.inactive: Only chopping up enough \Enemy[11]s will sate this bloodlust.
logs.active: Nothing will settle your raging beserker's heart more than to slay 30x \Enemy[11]s.
logs.completed: You revel in your glory for chopping up a whopping 30x \Enemy[11]s, wondering if anyone will remember them after this genocide.
logs.failed: You opted to spare the \Enemy[11] species for another day.
logs.missed: You forgot to slay the \Enemy[11]s, and your poor berserker's heart was severely disillusioned.

objectives.description: After chopping all those ghosties up, you need to boast to someone about it.

logs.active: Report your amazing slaughterfest to the Quest Manager.
logs.completed: The Quest Manager was delighted to hear you curbed the ghosty menace.
logs.failed: No one was able to hear of your incredible exploits...
logs.missed: You didn't share your exploits with anyone, and the world was none-the-wiser.
